title: Can I use Collaborate with an existing project?

sections.title: Symptoms
content: • I have a project and would like to know if I could use it with Unity Collaborate.

sections.title: Cause
content: You are interested in using Unity Collaborate and would like to know if it is possible to use one of your own existing projects.

sections.title: Resolution
content: Yes, existing projects can enable Unity Collaborate features in the Unity Editor (5.5+ or later).

sections.title: More Information
content: We recommend using the most recent version, but if you need access to Unity Collaborate in 5.4, please contact us.
